LanguageData.EnvironmentDark.stages.0.label: darkness
LanguageData.EnvironmentDark.stages.0.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I don't like it.
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.0.label: ratty apparel
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.0.description: The holes in my outfit are annoyingly large. Can't I get something new to wear?
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.1.label: tattered apparel
LanguageData.ApparelDamaged.stages.1.description: This thing looks like it's about to fall apart. Can't I wear something that doesn't belong in a trash heap?
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.0.label: tainted {0}
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.0.description: I am wearing a piece of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.1.label: tainted {0} (+1)
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.1.description: I am wearing two pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.2.label: tainted {0} (+2)
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.2.description: I am wearing three pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.3.label: tainted {0} etc
LanguageData.DeadMansApparel.stages.3.description: I am wearing four or more pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.0.label: human leather {0}
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.0.descript: Wearing human leather is disturbing. Who could do this?
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.1.label: human leather {0} (+1)
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.1.descript: I'm dressed like an insane person.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.2.label: human leather {0} (+2)
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.2.descript: I think there may be a face on my clothes. Oh, no... my clothes *are* a face.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.3.label: human leather {0} etc
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelSad.stages.3.descript: I look like a freak from a horror show, and I feel like I'm in a horror show.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.0.label: human leather {0}
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.0.descri: I enjoy wearing the suffering of others.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.1.label: human leather {0} (+1)
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.1.descri: This will scare them. All will know my power.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.2.label: human leather {0} (+2)
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.2.descri: The faces on my clothes aren't smiling, but they make *me* happy.
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.3.label: human leather {0} etc
LanguageData.HumanLeatherApparelHappy.stages.3.descri: The flesh! The flesh signals my triumph!
LanguageData.Sick.stages.0.label: sick
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.0.label: chilly
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.1.label: cold
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.2.label: numbing cold
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.2.description: I can't stop shivering. My teeth are chattering. All I can think of is getting warm.
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.3.label: absolutely freezing
LanguageData.EnvironmentCold.stages.3.description: My teeth are chattering so hard I can barely speak. My toes are numb. I need to get warm.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.0.label: sweaty
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.0.description: It's too hot here. I'm sweating.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.1.label: hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.1.description: It's way too hot here. If I could just have a breath of cool air...
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.2.label: sweltering hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.2.description: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.3.label: blistering hot
LanguageData.EnvironmentHot.stages.3.description: This place is searing hot. I think I could die from this heat!
